sentences.en: Altman strips away the pretence and mythology to expose the film industry as a business like any other.
sentences.cn: 奥尔特曼揭去了电影产业的伪装和神秘光环，暴露了其与其他产业并无二致的商业本质。

sentences.en: By bathing in unclean water, they expose themselves to contamination.
sentences.cn: 在不干净的水中洗澡，他们可能会受到感染。

sentences.en: Don't expose it to the sun.
sentences.cn: 谨防日晒.

sentences.en: Don't expose undeveloped film to light.
sentences.cn: 不要把未冲洗的胶卷暴露在光照下.

sentences.en: Expose ends in partial - thickness burns when the crust desquamates and falls off.
sentences.cn: 在部分厚度烧伤,痂皮剥脱和脱掉后,暴露即告结束.

sentences.en: He lifted his T-shirt to expose a jagged scar across his chest.
sentences.cn: 他撩起T恤衫，露出横贯胸部的锯齿状伤疤。

sentences.en: He was going to expose their triviality once and for all.
sentences.cn: 他将彻底暴露他们的浅薄无能.

sentences.en: I'm a layman. What I'm going to say may expose myself to ridicule, yet I still want to say a few words.
sentences.cn: 我是个外行, 我说的话可能贻笑大方, 可我还是要说几句.

sentences.en: I’m afraid I might expose my real feelings for him.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我会流露出对他的真实感情。

sentences.en: If someone is being hypocritical then it is fair to expose that.
sentences.cn: 如果有人虚伪矫饰，那就应该暴露他的真面目。

sentences.en: Lowered sea levels exposed the shallow continental shelf beneath the Bering Sea.
sentences.cn: 下降了的海平面使白令海底的浅大陆架露了出来。

sentences.en: She might expose his crooked business deals to her tax inspector brother.
sentences.cn: 她可能会向当税务稽查员的哥哥揭发他那些不正当的交易。

sentences.en: She threatened to publicly expose his double life if he left her.
sentences.cn: 她威胁说如果他离开她，她就将他双重人格的生活方式公之于众。

sentences.en: The film exposes the utter horror of war.
sentences.cn: 这部电影揭示了战争的极端恐怖。

sentences.en: The newspaper published an expose of the film star's past life.
sentences.cn: 报纸发表了该影星的逸闻.

sentences.en: The report exposes the weaknesses of modern medical practice.
sentences.cn: 报道揭露了现代医疗的不足之处。

sentences.en: The report revealed that workers had been exposed to high levels of radiation.
sentences.cn: 报告披露工人们受到了高强度的辐射。

sentences.en: The surgeon cut through connective tissue to expose the bone.
sentences.cn: 外科医生割开结缔组织,让骨头露出来.

sentences.en: We must expose this shameful activity to the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要向报社揭露这一无耻行径.

sentences.en: We will not expose ourselves by attempting to laugh without a subject.
sentences.cn: 我们不可能凭自笑人家,弄得反而惹人笑话.

sentences.en: When Myra told Karp she'd expose his past, he blew up.
sentences.cn: 当迈拉告诉卡普她会把他的过去全抖搂出去时，卡普大为光火。

trans.tran_en: to show something that is usually covered or hidden

trans.tran_cn: 使暴露， 曝光； 揭露
